EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO (1338321205.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO (1338321205.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi MaryKay, I actually did not receive anything from you, what number did you fax the documents to? Also when will the project start that you are planning on running through MBO? I would be happy to reach out to your client to get the contract process started. Please advise. Thank you!Nicolette From: MK Penn [mailto:mkpenn@msn.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 1:38 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Hi Nicolette, This took forever but I finally faxed in my papers on Friday. Please let me know that you received them and what the next step is. Glad to finally get this done, MaryKay Penn Consultant (212) 281-7050 From: Nicolette Taylor <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Sent: Tuesday, November 15, 2011 12:33 PMTo: MK Penn <mailto:mkpenn@msn.com> Subject: RE: MBO Hi MaryKay, You may now log in by going to www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com>, clicking LOGIN at the top right of the page and then verify the information you entered in our system last year during your initial enrollment process. At the end you will sign the GSA and you can print off the I9 form that is part of the enrollment packet that pops up at the end of the process. Take the I9 to a local notary and have them sign as an authorized representative and email me the signed I9 as well as a clear copy of your passport (if that is the identification you entered in your I9 information). Please let me know if you need any assistance with this and also let me know when you are available to speak. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorBusiness ManagerMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <wlmailhtml:bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: MK Penn [mailto:mkpenn@msn.com] Sent: Friday, November 11, 2011 6:56 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Hi Nicolette, Thanks for getting back to me. I went through a long orientation process with Kelly and then got so busy that I didnt get the papers notarized and returned to her. Now the forms are a year old. Id like to move forward with registering. Is it possible to have a another set of documents sent to me? MaryKay Penn Consultant (212) 281-7050 From: Nicolette Taylor <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Sent: Friday, November 11, 2011 5:39 PMTo: MK Penn <mailto:mkpenn@msn.com> Subject: RE: MBO Hi MaryKay, Per Kellys email I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Have a great weekend! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorBusiness ManagerMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <wlmailhtml:bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kelly Scherer Sent: Thursday, November 10, 2011 6:09 PM To: MK Penn Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Hi Mary Kay I hope all is well! I actually took over a new role here at MBO Partners, but, Nicolette Taylor (ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>) will be more than happy to pick up where we left off! Best of luck! Thank you ___________________________________Kelly SchererDirector, Associate ServicesMBO Partners t: 703.793.6025f: 703.793.6085e: kscherer@mbopartners.com <mailto:kscherer@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: MK Penn [mailto:mkpenn@msn.com] Sent: Thursday, November 10, 2011 11:11 AM To: Kelly Scherer Subject: Re: MBO Hi Kelly, I doubt you remember me from 2010. Ive been intending to sign up with MBO THAT long. I finally have some larger contracts coming through and would love the help. Can you send me the sign up documents once again? Heres my address; MaryKay Penn700 Lenox AvenueApt. 9JNew York, New York 10039 Thanks for your patience, MaryKay Penn Consultant (212) 281-7050 From: Kelly Scherer <mailto:kscherer@mbopartners.com> Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 2010 2:18 PMTo: mkpenn@msn.com <mailto:mkpenn@msn.com> Subject: MBO Hi Mary Kay- I just wanted to follow up and see how things were coming along with the contracts? Were you still hoping to run them through MBO, or has that moved elsewhere? Thanks! Kelly SchererTeam Manager, PSGDirect: 703-793-6025Toll Free: 800-556-0270 x6025 Fax: 703-793-6085 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 550 Herndon, VA 20171 www.mbopartners.com <blocked::http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
